column1: Wow! What a beautiful meteor shower.
So many flashing lights,
they make me want to see more!
Should be around here.
Kage reported some strange people approaching the altar.
This would be the place to intercept them,
but I don't see anyone…
Eh? It's just a human.
What is she doing at this late hour in the dangerous bamboo forest?
Well, since I'm a youkai, it's my duty to scare her.
I'll use your blood to paint my roses red!
Ah! Where did you come from?
Aw, shucks, she found me.
And I wanted to silently creep up from behind
and tear you in half.
Darn it! It's a youkai.
(I can feel her breath, but nothing else.)
(Just what kind of youkai is this…?)
Are you wondering why you didn't see me?
It's because I can act subconsciously,
and I'll make you die in bewilderment!
What a fearful opponent.
Let me show you the power of humans!
Begone, youkai!
